name: Kurihara Mari (Prison School)
description:
Lora model for Kurihara Mari from Prison School, requested on my previous Hana model. I tested it mostly on weight 0.8-0.9.

I experimented a bit here and I'm happy with results, you can get various outfit pretty consistently for only half the filesize :D

Main phrase to use is kurihara mari \(prison school\) and for the regular outfit you should use school uniform, neck ribbon, pleated skirt, pantyhose. If you add white shirt you will most often end up with jacket so do that if that's what you're going for.

For prison outfit use striped, striped shirt, striped shorts, midriff. And also instead you can do striped bikini if you want! And why wouldn't you! +_+

modelVersions.name: V1
trainedWords: school uniform, neck ribbon, pleated skirt, pantyhose
striped, striped shirt, striped shorts, midriff
